mapper.insert: insert into app_output( app_id, factory_id, goods_id, repertory_id, goods_name, goods_code, output_date, output_num, output_price, is_click_farming, is_gift, consumer_id, remark, create_user, create_time )values( #{appId}, #{factoryId}, #{goodsId}, #{repertoryId}, #{goodsName}, #{goodsCode}, to_date('${outputDate}','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), ${outputNum}, ${outputPrice}, ${isClickFarming}, ${isGift}, #{consumerId}, #{remark}, #{createUser}, sysdate )
mapper.select:
select tb.*, to_char(tb.output_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as output_date_tochar, (select b.factory_name from sys_factory b where tb.factory_id = b.factory_id) as factory_name, (select a.goods_img from sys_goods a where a.goods_id = tb.goods_id) as goods_img, case tb.is_click_farming when 1 then '是' when 0 THEN '否' END as is_click_farming_chn, case tb.is_gift when 1 then '是' when 0 THEN '否' END as is_gift_chn, (select u.user_name from sys_user u where u.user_id=tb.create_user) as create_by_transformation, (select u.user_name from sys_user u where u.user_id=tb.update_user) as update_by_transformation from app_output tb where 1 = 1
and ( tb.meal_code like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{p.goodsName}),'%') OR tb.meal_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{p.goodsName}),'%') OR tb.goods_code like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{p.goodsName}),'%') OR tb.goods_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{p.goodsName}),'%') )
and ( tb.out_date >= to_date('${p.startDate}','yyyy-mm-dd') )
and ( tb.out_date <= to_date('${p.endDate}','yyyy-mm-dd') )
and ( tb.is_click_farming = ${p.isClickFarming} )
and ( tb.is_gift = ${p.isGift} )
and ( tb.factory_id = #{p.factoryId} )
order by tb.output_date desc

select count(1) as totalCount from app_output tb where 1 = 1
and ( tb.meal_code like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{p.goodsName}),'%') OR tb.meal_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{p.goodsName}),'%') OR tb.goods_code like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{p.goodsName}),'%') OR tb.goods_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{p.goodsName}),'%') )
order by tb.create_time desc
